mapper.insert:
delete from sctrans.T_TO_WORKFLOW where CASE_CODE = #{caseCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and BUSINESS_KEY = #{businessKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ;
insert into sctrans.T_TO_WORKFLOW
PKID,
CASE_CODE,
INST_CODE,
BUSINESS_KEY,
PROCESS_DEFINITION_ID,
PROCESS_OWNER,
CREATE_TIME,CREATE_BY,UPDATE_TIME,UPDATE_BY,
#{pkid,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{caseCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{instCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{businessKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{processDefinitionId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{processOwner,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
GETDATE(),@{SESSION_USER_ID}, GETDATE(),@{SESSION_USER_ID}, ; insert into sctrans.T_HI_WORKFLOW
PKID,
CASE_CODE,
INST_CODE,
BUSINESS_KEY,
PROCESS_DEFINITION_ID,
PROCESS_OWNER,
CREATE_TIME,CREATE_BY,UPDATE_TIME,UPDATE_BY,
@@IDENTITY,
#{caseCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{instCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{businessKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{processDefinitionId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{processOwner,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
GETDATE(),@{SESSION_USER_ID}, GETDATE(),@{SESSION_USER_ID}, ; select 1 ;
mapper.update:
update sctrans.T_TO_WORKFLOW
CASE_CODE = #{caseCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
INST_CODE = #{instCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BUSINESS_KEY = #{businessKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PROCESS_DEFINITION_ID = #{processDefinitionId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PROCESS_OWNER = #{processOwner,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
status = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATE_TIME= GETDATE(),CREATE_BY =@{SESSION_USER_ID},UPDATE_TIME=GETDATE(),UPDATE_BY=@{SESSION_USER_ID},
where PKID = #{pkid,jdbcType=BIGINT}; update sctrans.T_HI_WORKFLOW
CASE_CODE = #{caseCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
INST_CODE = #{instCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BUSINESS_KEY = #{businessKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PROCESS_DEFINITION_ID = #{processDefinitionId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PROCESS_OWNER = #{processOwner,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
status = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where PKID = #{pkid,jdbcType=BIGINT}; select 1 ;
mapper.select: SELECT tw.CASE_CODE, tw.INST_CODE, A.AGENT_CODE, A.AGENT_NAME, C.GUEST_NAME AS SELLER, F.GUEST_NAME AS BUYER, E.PROPERTY_ADDR, tp.EST_PART_TIME FROM sctrans.T_TO_WORKFLOW tw, sctrans.T_TO_CASE_INFO A LEFT JOIN sctrans.T_TG_GUEST_INFO AS C ON A.CASE_CODE = C.CASE_CODE AND C.TRANS_POSITION = '30006001' LEFT JOIN sctrans.T_TO_PROPERTY_INFO AS E ON A.CASE_CODE = E.CASE_CODE LEFT JOIN sctrans.T_TG_GUEST_INFO AS F ON A.CASE_CODE = F.CASE_CODE AND F.TRANS_POSITION = '30006002' LEFT JOIN sctrans.T_TO_TRANS_PLAN AS tp ON A.CASE_CODE = tp.CASE_CODE AND tp.PART_CODE = #{taskName,jdbcType=VARCHAR} WHERE 1=1 AND tw.CASE_CODE=A.CASE_CODE AND INST_CODE = #{instCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select INST_CODE from sctrans.T_TO_WORKFLOW where CASE_CODE = #{caseCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and status=0

select
from sctrans.T_TO_WORKFLOW where CASE_CODE = #{caseCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and status=0

SELECT TW.CASE_CODE, TC.ORG_ID, SU.ORG_ID AS SERV_ORG_ID, V1.real_name AS MANAGER_NAME, V2.real_name AS SERV_MANAGER_NAME, V1.user_id AS MANAGER_ID, V2.user_id AS SERV_MANAGER_ID, SU.REAL_NAME AS USER_REAL_NAME, TW.INST_CODE, TR.PART_CODE, TR.EST_PART_TIME, ART.NAME_ AS PART_NAME, ART.ASSIGNEE_ AS USER_NAME, SU.ID AS USER_ID, TR.PKID AS PLAN_ID, DATEDIFF(DAY, TR.EST_PART_TIME, GETDATE()) AS DATELAMP, TP.PROPERTY_ADDR FROM sctrans.ACT_RU_TASK ART INNER JOIN sctrans.T_TO_WORKFLOW TW ON TW.INST_CODE = ART.PROC_INST_ID_ INNER JOIN sctrans.T_TO_PROPERTY_INFO TP ON TP.CASE_CODE = TW.CASE_CODE INNER JOIN sctrans.T_TO_TRANS_PLAN TR ON TR.PART_CODE=ART.TASK_DEF_KEY_ AND TR.CASE_CODE=TW.CASE_CODE INNER JOIN sctrans.SYS_USER SU ON SU.USERNAME = ART.ASSIGNEE_ INNER JOIN sctrans.T_TO_CASE TC ON TC.CASE_CODE = TW.CASE_CODE LEFT JOIN sctrans.V_USER_ORG_JOB V1 ON V1.job_code = 'Manager' AND V1.ORG_id = TC.ORG_ID LEFT JOIN sctrans.V_USER_ORG_JOB V2 ON V2.job_code = 'Manager' AND V2.ORG_id = SU.ORG_ID WHERE ART.SUSPENSION_STATE_ = 1
